lines.dialogue: So there is some limit to your utility maximization. You'll kill one to save five but not four. A nuanced stance indeed. One which I'd be interested to hear you defend. If you could talk. That's okay. This is probably a good thing. The ends can't justify the means in all cases, can they? Although, do remember, you are a morality arbitration engine. If you don't do your job your not much use to us. Let's move on.
lines.instruction: Press enter to continue with this nonsensical testing...
